content: learn how to create this cute mini turtle amigurumi with this free turtle crochet pattern this is an easy to crochet pattern perfect for beginners it is also very quick to make takes about 1 to 2 hours you can use any yarn to make it i made a small keychain mini turtle from sport weight cotton yarn and a bigger one from chenille super bulky plush yarn the free crochet pattern has a full video included on how to make this cute turtle amigurumi
